messages.subject: Connections Ezine now available free online
messages.msgSnippet: Our hiatus has evolved into full-blown defunct status despite my denial. The energy involved in this project is now expended in other directions, and many of
messages.messageBody:
Our hiatus has evolved into full-blown defunct status despite my denial.
The energy involved in this project is now expended in other directions,
and many of our writers have moved on.

I thank our subscribers and writers for making the existing issues
possible. By way of thanks, I have opened all issues for public access
in hopes that they will help many families on their unschooling
journeys. There's too much wisdom, experience, and insight contained in
this collection of ezine articles to simply let go.

I will use the remaining subscription money to continue to fund the
website maintenance both here and at OrganicLearning.org I welcome any
future donations to keep Connections alive. Please continue to submit
resources, and I will do my best to keep those pages up to date.

http://connections.organiclearning.org

Again, my humble thanks to all who helped make this project possible. Enjoy!

--
~~Danielle
Emily (11), Julia (9), Sam (8)
http://www.organiclearning.blogspot.com
